mapper.select: /* 사용자 목록 조회 */ SELECT R1.* FROM( SELECT USER_ID as "userId" , USER_PW as "userPw" , USER_COMP as "userComp" , USER_CLS as "userCls" , NEW_DT as "newDt" , MOD_DT as "modDt" FROM USERS ORDER BY USER_CLS ASC, USER_ID ASC ) R1 LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{start}

/* 사용자 조회 */ SELECT USER_ID as "userId" , USER_PW as "userPw" , USER_COMP as "userComp" , USER_CLS as "userCls" , NEW_DT as "newDt" , MOD_DT as "modDt" FROM USERS
AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}
